title: download/ updating problems
body: so today i waited 11 hours to try to download league on my new laptop but everytime it got to about half way it told me to restart so  i did this 6 times but then on the 7th try i got to 99 percent and it told me to restart this is the reason why i made this post and if anyone knows how to fix this problem please tell me.
